name: Capital Cards
description:
Welcome!

You've arrived at your island paradise! You're the new mayor of, well... there's nothing here yet, but everything you need is in this deck of cards. Use them to build and upgrade residential, commercial and industrial zones, construct parks, power plants and skyscrapers. But remember, we're on a budget here, so plan your city, manage supply and demand and you'll be on your way to a successful (and profitable) city in no time.

Features
  • Use a deck of cards to build an island paradise.
  • Balance supply and demand for three distinct zones.
  • A unique deck is generated for each new day. It's the same for everyone so compete with your friends!
  • You can play any deck from the last week.
  • Record your largest treasury for each deck.
  • Pick one of four specialty cards, each with their own benefits.
  • Play with one of two color schemes.
Minimum Requirements
  • 1.8Ghz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • 4GB RAM
